sen.j: 行修（ぎょうしゅう、生没年不明)は、奈良時代の大安寺僧。
sen.e: Gyoshu (dates of birth and death unknown) was a priest at Daian-ji Temple in the Nara period.
Gyoshu (dates of birth and death unknown) was a priest of Daian-ji Temple in the Nara period.
Gyoshu (dates of birth and death unknown) was a priest of Daian-ji Temple in the Nara period.

sen.j: 宝亀年間（770年 - 781年）に、大安寺の大寺主大法師を務めた。
sen.e: Between 770 and 781, he served as 大寺主 daihoshi at Daian-ji Temple.
Between 770 and 781, he served as 大寺主 daihoshi at Daian-ji Temple.
Between 770 and 781, he served as 大寺主 daihoshi at Daian-ji Temple.

sen.j: 『大方広十輪経』巻一・三・七の奥書に名前があるという。
sen.e: It is said that His name was written in Okugaki (postscript) of the first, third and seventh volumes of "Daihokojuringyo."
It is said that his name was written in Okugaki (postscript) of the first, third and seventh volumes of "Daihokojuringyo."
